statements: SELECT * FROM LivestockHealth WHERE temperature > 38.5
SELECT tag_id, health_status FROM LivestockHealth WHERE heart_rate < 80
SELECT temperature, heart_rate FROM LivestockHealth WHERE tag_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealth WHERE health_status = 'Sick' ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS average_heart_rate FROM LivestockHealth WHERE tag_id IN (1001, 1002, 1003)
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealth WHERE tag_id = 1234;
SELECT tag_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM LivestockHealth WHERE temperature > 38.5;
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealth WHERE health_status = 'Sick' ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM LivestockHealth;
SELECT tag_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM LivestockHealth GROUP BY tag_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM animal_health_data WHERE temperature > 38.5;
SELECT animal_id, heart_rate FROM animal_health_data WHERE heart_rate < 80;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Barn';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE battery_level < 30.0;
SELECT * FROM animal_health_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT animal_id, temperature, heart_rate FROM animal_health_data WHERE temperature > 38.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, location, battery_level FROM sensor_data WHERE battery_level < 20.5 ORDER BY sensor_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM animal_health_data JOIN sensor_data ON animal_health_data.rfid_tag_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE temperature > 39.0 AND heart_rate < 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT animal_id, temperature FROM animal_health_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location, last_update FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' OR sensor_type = 'Humidity' ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT id, animal_type, age FROM Livestock WHERE age > 5;
SELECT animal_type, weight FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 100;
SELECT * FROM RFIDTags ORDER BY last_scan_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_location, sensor_reading FROM HealthSensors WHERE sensor_reading < 10;
SELECT * FROM Livestock ORDER BY animal_type ASC, age DESC;
SELECT animal_type, age FROM Livestock WHERE health_status = 'Good';
SELECT * FROM RFIDTags WHERE tag_number BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY last_scan_timestamp DESC;
SELECT animal_type, weight, health_status FROM Livestock JOIN RFIDTags ON Livestock.id = RFIDTags.animal_id;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_location, sensor_reading, last_update_timestamp FROM HealthSensors ORDER BY sensor_reading DESC, last_update_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT id, RFID_tag FROM Livestock ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM RFIDTags WHERE tag_location = 'Barn';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM HealthSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT l.id, h.sensor_type, h.health_status FROM Livestock l JOIN LivestockHealthData d ON l.id = d.livestock_id JOIN HealthSensors h ON d.sensor_id = h.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE id = 1;
SELECT RFID_tag, health_sensor_data FROM Livestock WHERE id = 2;
SELECT Livestock.id, RFID_tag, tag_location FROM Livestock JOIN RFIDTags ON Livestock.id = RFIDTags.tag_id;
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_data FROM HealthSensors WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT Livestock.id, LivestockHealthData.health_status FROM Livestock JOIN LivestockHealthData ON Livestock.id = LivestockHealthData.livestock_id;
SELECT * FROM Livestock;
SELECT name, breed, weight FROM Livestock ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT name, breed, date_of_birth FROM Livestock WHERE breed = 'Holstein';
SELECT * FROM RFIDTags WHERE activation_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT veterinarian_id, livestock_id, visit_date FROM VisitHistory WHERE veterinarian_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM Livestock WHERE weight > 500 ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT name, breed FROM Livestock WHERE breed = 'Angus'
SELECT id, name, date_of_birth FROM Livestock WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM RFIDTags JOIN Livestock ON RFIDTags.livestock_id = Livestock.id WHERE last_scanned > '2021-06-01'

SELECT HealthSensors.sensor_type, HealthSensors.reading, VisitHistory.diagnosis FROM HealthSensors JOIN VisitHistory ON HealthSensors.tag_id = VisitHistory.livestock_id WHERE HealthSensors.reading > 38.5
